# 尚硅谷 Java 技术之网上书城

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/shang-guigu-java-jishu-zhi-wangshang-shucheng
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/shang-guigu-java-jishu-zhi-wangshang-shucheng
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install shang-guigu-java-jishu-zhi-wangshang-shucheng
shang-guigu-java-jishu-zhi-wangshang-shucheng <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g shang-guigu-java-jishu-zhi-wangshang-shucheng
shang-guigu-java-jishu-zhi-wangshang-shucheng <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
